whoiam.subtitle: A little bit about me
whoiam.title: Who I am?
whoiam.content:
Hi! Iâ€™m Imanol Rodriguez de Maya, a developer based in Barcelona, Spain. With experience as a Front end developer, I specialize in optimizing, improving performance, and delivering high-quality web products.

The web and development are my passions, and as part of that passion, I offer services to help your business grow through great websites, web apps, or e-commerce platforms. I am dedicated to using my skills and expertise to help you succeed online.

In addition, I am a problem-solver and a team player. I enjoy working closely with clients and collaborating with other professionals to create solutions that are effective, efficient, and user-friendly. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to grow and learn, and I am committed to delivering top-quality work that meets or exceeds your expectations.

Whether you need some of the services that I offer or help with an existing online project, I am here to help. Please feel free to contact me to discuss your needs and goals, and to learn more about how I can help you. I look forward to working with you!

services.title: Services
services.subtitle: Some services that I can provide

website.title: Website
website.description: Get a fast, accessible and SEO friendly website managed from a CMS (Wordpress, Drupal, Contentful, etc) based on your designs.

webapp.title: Webapp
webapp.description: Get a higly performant web application with authentication and complex features.

ecommerce.title: Ecommerce
ecommerce.description: Get a ready to sell ecommerce with a fast website and optimized process of checkout.
